description: Capacity Building of the Sudan Judiciary

subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
subproject.description:
.- Increased capacity of the judiciary (Technical and Research Bureau) to provide technical support to its members.
- Judiciary Training Administration knowledge and capacity enhanced.
- Increased administrative capacity of the judiciary .
- Staff and project operations managed in  compliance with  UNDP Programme and Operations Policies and Procedures.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Capacity Building of the Judic
